Additional information: The force is using the old Framework to purchase this item code 24BF A1 which is equivalent to 07BFA1. As such, from 01 March 2016 this will convert to 24BF. The items in question are covered under a formal contract (which is between regional forces). Therefore the item price remains the same regardless of whether one unit is ordered or multiple, as unit prices were derived based on indicative annual volumes at the time of tender rather than on an order by order basis.

The force is using the old framework code for this item. There is no equivalent pricing point under the old framework for Crime Stains as the described item code 01BF has been split into codes 20BF and 22BF. However, from 01 March 2016 this price will convert to joint codes 20BF-B1 plus 22BF-B1 for a total £85.56. The items in question are covered under a formal contract which is regional between forces. Therefore, the item price remains the same regardless of whether single or multiple items are purchased, as unit prices are based on indicative annual volumes at the time of tender rather than on an order by order basis.
